name: Taylor's Secret: Merge story
description:
Are you ready to join Taylor on the mysterious adventure of a lifetime? Taylor's Secret: Merge Story is an exciting mystery game featuring Taylor, whose mother mysteriously disappeared while working at a dream resort. Follow Taylor as she embarks on an journey to find her mother, using construction as her guide. Throughout her journey, she must contend with suspicious Islanders, a rival luxury resort, and rumors of an infamous cursed cat. Along with the help of her childhood neighbor, Felix, Taylor will uncover long-buried secrets and conspiracies, eventually leading her to the truth about why her mother disappeared.

Taylor's secret is a brand-new merge game where you earn experience by merging items to complete tasks. Merge hamburgers, cola and other materials, discover more items to rebuild your island together with the islanders! But be careful, the process of rebuilding may not be simple, and a greedy competitor is trying to break your blueprint.
In Taylor's secret, you will:
1. Merge items to discover more props and buildings to restore your island.
2. Unlock new areas with unique gameplay, enrich your island resources, and attract more customers.
3. Interact with more island residents. They will give you tasks and clues to help you rebuild the island and discover the truth of the matter.
4. The fascinating story and exquisite game animation bring you a better game experience and relax you.
5. Easy gameplay. Repair your island by simply merging two of the same items.

Download now and become a part of Taylor's journey today!
If you have any feedback or any cool ideas for the game, please visit taylorsecret.mergegame@outlook.com
